item.title: Weâ€™re back!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Actually we got back yesterday, but I was way too busy to blog. The show was excellent, the first day (Saturday) started off pretty rough, we had to setup in pouring rain at 5AM, but the sky's cleared and sales were really good. Christine got horrible sun stroke and had to stay in on Saturday night, but she sent me away with my parents to hit up this great brewery (mmm beer) near the hotel. Sunday she was feeling better and sales were also great that day too. The only thing that marred the weekend was I was pulled over doing 19 miles over the speed limit on the way home (84 in a 65), oh well at least it was in the last 20 minutes of the drive.
